title: [Question] 5th sem textbook doubt
content: From this semester I want to properly read the textbooks but there are 2-3 for each subject and each topic is about 10 pages. All this while I was able to maintain a decent GPA with slides. But now I also want to properly understand them. How did the seniors manage doing this along with projects/internships?

comments.body: Just go through the Topics in textbook which are given in the syllabus for DBMS . And for ml read the whole textbook (Tom M Mitchell) .Never start with Ethem alpaydin .SE (slides)
